name: Flight-capable wings
description: You may fly at your movement speed.  Under stressful flying conditions, you will need to perform Athletics Tests or risk failing and gaining the exhausted Status.

name: Quick Learner
description: 5 bonus Development Points.

name: Naturalist
description: Rolls in Forest environments gain +1.

name: Undergrounder
description: Rolls in Underground environments gain +1.

name: Seasider
description: Rolls aboard ships or underwater gain +1.

name: Citysider
description: Rolls in large cities gain +1.

name: Sensorium
description: You can see in darkness to 10sq.  Immune to Blind and Deaf Status Effects.  Perception Move +1 Bonus.  No disadvantage when attacking invisible or hidden creatures.

name: Sure-footed
description: You gain +1sq Jump vertical, +3sq Fall vertical.  You are immune to difficult terrain.  You cannot be tripped.  Athletics Move +2 Bonus.

name: Influencer
description: You gain a +1 Bonus to: Influence, Sense Motive, Art / Craft, Stealth, Subterfuge and Perform.

name: Flow Battery
description: Once per day as a Free Action, you can release energy at Touch that deals 5 Damage of the type of one of your Magical Synergies, that automatically hits and is considered a Critical Cast.  You regain this ability whenever a Spell is Cast on you.

name: Hardy
description: Any time you take Verve Damage, you take 1 less.

name: Stored Potential
description: You may purchase 2 more Move Points than your Statistics require.

name: Push your limits
description: As a Free Action, you may sacrifice 15 Verve to use an additional Mod on a Move.

name: Natural Athlete
description: Move sq +1.  You can perform a Relocate for an additional hour before requiring an Athletics Roll to check Exhaustion.

name: Fated
description: Your rolls count towards World Changers when you roll a 19 or 20.

name: Lucky
description: You may reroll one Roll per day.

name: Quick Sleeper
description: A unit of rest is 20 minutes.

name: Deep Breaths
description: You may hold your breath safely for 5 minutes.

name: Channeller
description: Bonus Mana: 2

name: Conduit
description: Starting Psi: 5

name: Vervatious
description: Bonus Verve: 5

name: Jack of All Trades
description: You can exceed the maximum Mod purchases in Move Categories by 1.

name: Faeform
description: You transform your body as per the Transmute Flesh Spell Standard Effect, 3 times per day, with the effects lasting for 2 hours.  You always adopt the same form, which you choose at character creation from Human, Elven, Dwarven or Halfling of any gender.

name: Tiny Stature
description: Unavailable for players.  Maximum Dodge +3, MoveSq. -2, Strength-based Moves -2.

name: Small Stature
description: Maximum Dodge +1, MoveSq. -1

name: Medium Stature
description: No change

name: Larger Stature
description: Maximum Dodge -1, Starting Verve +5

name: Huge Stature
description: Unavailable for players.  Maximum Dodge -3, Starting Verve +20, Strength-basd Moves +2.
